```{R}
land <- read.csv("data/LandUsePer_BM_2023_cartoISea.csv", header = TRUE, sep = ",")
head(land)
```

```{r}
install.packages("ggspatial")
install.packages("prettymapr")
library(ggspatial)
```


```{R}
library(sf)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggspatial)

land_sf <- st_as_sf(land, coords = c("X", "Y"), crs = 2154)
land_sf_transformed <- st_transform(land_sf, crs = 4326)

ggplot(data = land_sf_transformed) +
  annotation_map_tile() +  
  geom_sf(aes(color = MOS11)) +  
  scale_color_gradient(low = "blue", high = "red") +  
  theme_minimal()
```
